question: {name} is feeding his livestock {food}. Each {animal1} needs {n1} {unit}, and each {animal2} needs {n2} {unit} less than twice the amount each {animal1} needs. Each {animal3} eats as much as a {animal1} and {animal2} eat combined. If there are {k1} {animal1}s, {k2} {animal2}s, and {k3} {animal3}s, how many {unit} of {food} does {name} need?
